name: code-documentation
description: Comprehensive code documentation, explanation, and generation with scientific computing support
author: Documentation Team

agents.name: code-reviewer
agents.description: Elite code review expert specializing in modern AI-powered code analysis

agents.name: docs-architect
agents.description: Creates comprehensive technical documentation from existing codebases

agents.name: tutorial-engineer
agents.description: Creates step-by-step tutorials and educational content from code

commands.name: /code-explain
commands.description: Detailed explanation of code structure, functionality, and design patterns with scientific computing support

commands.name: /update-docs
commands.description: Comprehensively update and optimize Sphinx docs, README, and related documentation with AST-based extraction
